10 Lindsey Featherstone

Position F

Height 5-4

Year Fifth Year

S/C R

Hometown Woodbury, Minn.

Previous Team Hill Murray HS

Bio

Related

Stats

Historical

Biography

2021-22 (5th)

• WCHA Scholar-Athlete

• WCHA All-Academic Team

• AHCA/Krampade All-American Scholar

Set BSU records for most games played (163) and most consecutive games played... Played in all 34 games for the Beavers in her final season... Marked four goals and three assists for seven points... Shot 41 pucks on net for a shooting percentage of .098... Ended the season with a -14 rating and one short-handed goal... Ended her career with a total of 10 goals, 12 assists, 22 points, and 143 shots on net.

2020-21 (Sr)

• WCHA Scholar-Athlete

• WCHA All-Academic Team

• AHCA Division I Krampade All-American Scholar

One of 12 Beavers to appear in all 20 games during a shortened 2020-21 season due to COVID-19... Named a WCHA Scholar Athlete and WCHA All-Academic Team selection... Tied for sixth on the team with four points off of one goal and three assists... Tied for fourth on the team in assists... Posted 17 shots on goal, was -10 on the ice and was one of seven Beavers with 0 penalty minutes... Tied for third among BSU forwards with 16 blocked shots.

2019-20 (Jr)

• WCHA Scholar-Athlete

• WCHA All-Academic Team

• AHCA Division I Krampade All-American Scholar

One of seven Beavers to appear in all 37 games during the season and posted two points off of two assists... Named a WCHA Scholar-Athlete and selected to the WCHA All-Academic Team for the second time in her career... Recorded 32 shots on goal, was -10 on the ice, blocked 14 shots, and totaled two penalty minutes.

2018-19 (So)

• AHCA All-American Scholar

• WCHA Scholar-Athlete

• WCHA All-Academic Team

Played in all 36 games for the Beavers this season, recording eight points on four goals and four assists... Totaled 38 shots and 16 blocks overall on the season... Set career-highs in shots with five against Minnesota Duluth (Jan. 11) and in points with two against Mercyhurst (Dec. 8)... Finished eighth on the team in goals with four, tenth in points with four, and was fifth on the team with a .105 shot percentage.

2017-18 (Fr)

Skated in 36 of 38 games for the Beavers... Posted one goal on 15 shots to go along with 13 blocks on the season... Scored her first goal on her first career shot vs Syracuse (Sep. 30)... Registered a career-high four shots on goal at St. Cloud State (Nov. 22)... Blocked 13 shots.

Prior to BSU

Letterwinner in hockey and soccer at Hill Murray High School… Helped the Pioneers hockey team to three consecutive state tournament appearances and two consecutive State Championships in 2014 and 2015… Helped the Pioneer to a third-place finish at the state tournament in 2016… Posted 36 points (12g-24a) her senior season and totaled 30 points her junior season… Named team captain her junior and senior seasons… Participant in the state soccer tournament… Selected to Hill Murray’s Academic honor roll… Former Teammate of Jacqueline Kaasa at Hill Murray.

Personal

Daughter of Kevin and Katie Featherstone… Born Feb. 7, 1999… A finance major, minoring in management information system.

Career Highs

Goals: 1, 10x, last vs Minnesota State (Dec. 18, 2021)

Assists: 1, 11x, last vs St. Thomas (Jan. 29, 2022)

Points: 2, at Mercyhurst (12/8/18)

SOG: 5, vs Minnesota Duluth (1/11/19)

PIM: 2, 4x, last vs Minnesota (Oct. 30, 2021)
